author: Jackie Smith
title: Twitter has fallen in love with this grandma who got wasted with college girls on spring break
text:
The grandmother partied in Mexico with her granddaughter and other college students who were on spring break . My grandma is in Mexico taking shots with random girls on the beach and posting pics of it with captions like they're bff's.. pic.twitter.com/SA47BMUsX3 ‚ÄúMy grandma is in Mexico taking shots with random girls on the beach and posting pics of it with captions like they‚Äôre bff‚Äôs..‚Äù Grett‚Äôs granddaughter Payton wrote on Twitter . 
That‚Äôs not the only proof of grandma Doreen‚Äôs partying. There‚Äôs video too.
